original_text: And hast given them this land, which thou didst swear to their fathers to give them, a land flowing with milk and honey;
korean_text: 그들에게 주시기로 그 조상들에게 맹세하신 바 젖과 꿀이 흐르는 땅을 그들에게 주셨으므로

sentences.original_text: And hast given them this land
which thou didst swear to their fathers
a land flowing with milk and honey
